ShortDescription.Value: This pack adds new tram stations

Publish.LongDescription:
## Tram Stations Pack This asset packs adds different tram stations to the game, found in the Transport/Tram tab of the game. This pack was createdas there are not tram stations added in the base game.
In the current version this mod provides three different assets. First a simple plaza and six different platforms for trams, allowing three different bi-directional lanes to operate allowing fast transfers. Also a big city plaza that have four different tram platforms. There is also a metro or subway station with tram platforms
Previously this mod was called: Triangular Tram Station
## Added Assets: - Triangular Tram Station: it can be added to a side of a road, and can be connected using any of the three vertices of the triangle. - Metro Tram Plaza: a small plaza can be added to two different sides of the road (roads at the bottom and the right of the station). - Tram Park Plaza.
## Acknowlgedements
Asset bundled using the following utility: [https://github.com/CitiesSkylinesModding/CS2-CustomAssetPack](CS2-CustomAssetPack)
